Translations.Text: GOD bol JEDEN committed sea TVOJ SERVIS so ze ships roam it v accordance s JEHO ZAKON. Ona thus seek Jeho provisions lenze ona bol appreciative
He committed do tvoj servis everything heavens zem; all z Him! These som proofs ludia zrkadlit
Tell those verit forgive those nie expect dni GOD He fully platit everyone whatever they zarabat
Whoever zavodny righteousness robi for jeho own dobry whoever zavodny zly robi so jeho own detriment! Do tvoj Lord ona spatny listok
My dat Dieta z Izrael scripture wisdom prophethood zadovazit them dobry provisions my bestowed them inak blessings than any inaksie zaludnit
My dat them tu zretelny commandments. Ironically they nie dispute this znalost pojdem them. This bol ziarlivsot ich part Iste tvoj Lord judge them Dni Vzkriesenie everything they disputed
My potom appointed ona zriadit toje spravne zakon; ona nasledovat this nie nasledovat zelat z those nie zauzlit
They nie pomoc ona o all GOD bol transgressors ally 1 iny chvila GOD bol Lord z the righteous
This zadovazit enlightenments ludia guidance zlutovanie those bol certain
those zavodny zly expect my treat them same chovanie mat rad those verit lead righteous zivot? Viem ich zivot ich smrt bol the same zlo indeed bol ich judgment
